page.title: 09BIBLE CONFERENCE CENTRE
page.content: The area was originally a farm-now it is a conference centre for people from all walks of life-ministers,children, handicapped people and O.A.P.s.The centre will eventually be able to cater for 70 residents.Twenty-eight countries worldwide are involved with the Bible Club. For a one night stay at the centre the price is Â£2.00 per night per person on a self-catering basis.There are indoor and outdoor activities from swimming to hill climbing as well as the religious meeting.There are twenty two groups in Renfrewshire contacted by the Bible Club.At the moment the workers at the centre,who are from the Manpower Services Commission,are in the process of converting an old barn into another dormitory.
